equip.desc: The Titankins' all-consuming roars sweep across the battlefield. Two lightning-quick figures slaughter their way out of combat. "I alone will be enough to handle them." Every punch unleashed by the warrior sends spears of blood through the bodies of the enemy. "Brute force and nothing more. Watch my blade!" As a blade of pale silver slices in a curve, monsters drop like falling leaves. "A contest of speed?" The two charge at the other side simultaneously. Howls of anguish sound as the stealthy beasts behind them are struck down at once. Two voices can be heard at the same time. "That was my kill!"
equip.name: Victory In a Blink

skill_stages.desc: Deals 4 instance(s) of DMG, with each instance dealing Ice DMG equal to 39.6% of Mem's ATK to one random enemy. At the end, deals Ice DMG equal to 99% of Mem's ATK to all enemies.
skill_stages.name: Baddies! Trouble!

skill_stages.desc:
Advances the action of one designated ally by 100% and grants them "Mem's Support," lasting for 3 turn(s).
For every 1 instance of DMG dealt by a target that has "Mem's Support," additionally deals 1 instance of True DMG equal to 30% of the original DMG.
When using this ability on this unit, cannot trigger the action advance effect.
skill_stages.name: Lemme! Help You!

skill_stages.desc:
Increases all allies' CRIT DMG by an amount equal to 13.2% of Mem's CRIT DMG plus 26.4%.
If the Charge has yet to reach 100%, Mem automatically uses "Baddies! Trouble!" when taking action. When the Charge reaches 100%, Mem immediately takes action. In the next action, can select one ally and use "Lemme! Help You!".
skill_stages.name: Friends! Together!

skill_stages.desc: When Mem is summoned, immediately gains 50% Charge.
skill_stages.name: Go, Mem, Go!

skill_stages.desc: When Mem disappears, Trailblazer's action advances by 25%.
skill_stages.name: No... Regrets

ornaments.desc: Encapsulated in the plane is the Insumousu Autonomous Region of Thalassa. The Xianzhou Daiyu had crashed here, inspiring the civilization of Insumousu.
ornaments.name: Insumousu's Whalefall Ship

ornaments.desc: The fallen Xianzhou Daiyu is forever anchored in a foreign land. Perhaps it is time to untie its mooring ropes and let it return home.
ornaments.name: Insumousu's Frayed Hawser

ranks.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of ally targets with "Mem's Support" by 10%. When an ally target has "Mem's Support," the effect of "Mem's Support" also applies to the target's memosprite/memomaster. This effect cannot stack.
ranks.name: Narrator of the Present

ranks.desc: When ally memosprites (aside from Mem) take action, Trailblazer regenerates 8 Energy. This effect can trigger a max of 1 time(s) per turn. The trigger count resets at the start of Trailblazer's turn.
ranks.name: Gleaner of the Past

ranks.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Memosprite Talent Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
ranks.name: Chanter of the Future

ranks.desc: When an ally target with 0 Max Energy actively uses an ability, Mem can also gain 3% Charge, and the multiplier of the True DMG dealt by this target via "Mem's Support" additionally increases by 6%.
ranks.name: Dancer of the Muse

ranks.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
Memosprite Skill Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
ranks.name: Seamster of the Ode

ranks.desc: Ultimate's CRIT Rate is set at 100%.
ranks.name: Bearer of the Revelation

relics.desc: He often sits in the confessional booth listening to the stories. The earrings serve as a constant reminder that even the faintest whispers have their weight.
relics.name: Sacerdos' Melodic Earrings

relics.desc: A cybernetic prosthetic arm that can be disassembled at will. Capable of firing knuckles like bullets.
relics.name: Messenger's Transformative Arm

relics.desc: He often stands before the dressing mirror, ensuring his attire is impeccable and his features perfect. Before he leaves the house, he will ensure that everything is meticulously arranged, and no deviations will occur.
relics.name: Sacerdos' Ceremonial Garb

relics.desc: A pair of sneakers that support parkour activities. It is comfortable, and that is all it needs.
relics.name: Messenger's Par-kool Sneakers

skill_stages.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 110% of Trailblazer's ATK to one designated enemy.
skill_stages.name: Leave It to Me!

skill_stages.desc: Summons the memosprite Mem. If Mem is already on the field, restores Mem's HP by an amount equal to 66% of Mem's Max HP, and grants Mem 10% Charge.
skill_stages.name: I Choose You!

skill_stages.desc: Summons memosprite Mem. Grants Mem 40% Charge, then makes Mem deal Ice DMG equal to 264% of Mem's ATK to all enemies.
skill_stages.name: Together, Mem!

skill_stages.desc: Memosprite Mem has an initial SPD of 130 and a Max HP equal to 86% of Trailblazer's Max HP plus 688. For every 10 Energy regenerated by all allies in total, Mem gains 1% Charge.
skill_stages.name: Almighty Companion

skill_stages.desc:
After using Technique, creates a Special Dimension that lasts for 10 second(s). Enemies within the Special Dimension are placed in a Time Stop state, halting all their actions.
After entering battle against enemies afflicted with the Time Stop state, delays the action of all enemies by 50%, and then deals Ice DMG to all enemies equal to 100% of Trailblazer's ATK.
Only 1 Dimension Effect created by allies can exist at the same time.
skill_stages.name: Memories Back as Echoes

skill_stages.desc: When the battle starts, Trailblazer's action advances by 30%. When Mem is first summoned, grants Mem 40% Charge.
skill_stages.name: Rhapsode's Scepter

skill_stages.desc: When using "Baddies! Trouble!," Mem immediately gains 5% Charge.
skill_stages.name: Petite Parable

skill_stages.desc: When the Max Energy of an ally target that has "Mem's Support" exceeds 100, for every 10 excess Energy, additionally increases the multiplier of the True DMG dealt via "Mem's Support" by 2.0%, up to a max increase of 20%.
skill_stages.name: Magnets and Long Chains

equip.desc: Time flows through the mirror, metamorphosing the once inexperienced little girl into a seasoned songstress. She studies her reflection in the mirror. Time has altered all but her green eyes, which still remain as serene as a lake, as if recounting an unshakable faith. "You seem in high spirits today." "Yes... after all, there's a very important 'performance'." "Indeed. The Charmony Festival's rehearsal is about to start. Please head to the preparation room." ... She steps out from the dressing room, leaving behind the brilliant lights of the theater, fading into the distance. "My stage lies not here." She closes her eyes, letting the night swallow her silhouette. "From the past to the present, my song has always been for..." "For those who have lost hope."
equip.name: Flowing Nightglow

ornaments.desc: Encapsulated in the plane is Wacq Island, the most well-known island on Planet Vonwacq. Teeming with plant life, the island houses a gigantic tree called Thestang, bearing fruits that would give birth to the various kinds of the island's wildlife.
ornaments.name: Vonwacq's Island of Birth

ornaments.desc: On the coastline of Wacq Island, tidal waves rose and fell... This landscape remained the same for millennia and witnessed the rise and fall of civilizations just like those changing tides.
ornaments.name: Vonwacq's Islandic Coast

ranks.desc: While the "Concerto" state is active, all allies' All-Type RES PEN increases by 24%.
ranks.name: Land of Smiles

ranks.desc: While the Concerto state is active, all allies' SPD increases by 16%. The Talent's Energy Regeneration effect additionally increases by 1.
ranks.name: Afternoon Tea For Two

ranks.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
ranks.name: Inverted Tuning

ranks.desc: When using the Ultimate, dispels Crowd Control debuffs from all allies. While Robin is in the "Concerto" state, increases the Effect RES of all allies by 50%.
ranks.name: Raindrop Key

ranks.desc:
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
ranks.name: Lonestar's Lament

ranks.desc: While the "Concerto" state is active, the CRIT DMG for the Physical Additional DMG caused by the Ultimate increases by 450%. The effect of "Moonless Midnight" can trigger up to 8 time(s) and the trigger count is resets each time the Ultimate is used.
ranks.name: Moonless Midnight

relics.desc: A muzzle designed to tightly encage the captive's beastly visage, guarding against the feral fangs that yearn to inflict harm.
relics.name: Prisoner's Sealed Muzzle

relics.desc: A pair of leather gloves with partially cracked surfaces. The part where one holds a gun is particularly worn out.
relics.name: Musketeer's Coarse Leather Gloves

relics.desc: A prisoner's garment that restrains dangerous criminals. Its reversed-joint design confines the prisoner's body.
relics.name: Prisoner's Repressive Straitjacket

relics.desc: These riding boots have a V-shaped cutout. Appearing casual and loose, they are also very comfortable to wear.
relics.name: Musketeer's Rivets Riding Boots

skill_stages.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to 110% of Robin's ATK to a single target enemy.
skill_stages.name: Wingflip White Noise

skill_stages.desc: Increase DMG dealt by all allies by 55%, lasting for 3 turn(s). This duration decreases by 1 at the start of Robin's every turn.
skill_stages.name: Pinion's Aria

skill_stages.desc:
Robin enters the Concerto state and makes all teammates (i.e., excluding this unit) immediately take action.
While in the Concerto state, increases all allies' ATK by 24.3% of Robin's ATK plus 230. Moreover, after every attack by ally targets, Robin deals Physical Additional DMG equal to 129% of her ATK for 1 time, with a fixed CRIT Rate for this damage set at 100% and fixed CRIT DMG set at 150%.
While in the Concerto state, Robin is immune to Crowd Control debuffs and cannot enter her turn or take action until the Concerto state ends.
A Concerto countdown appears on the Action Order bar. When the countdown's turn begins, Robin exits the Concerto state and immediately takes action. The countdown has its own fixed SPD of 90.
skill_stages.name: Vox Harmonique, Opus Cosmique

skill_stages.desc: Increase all allies' CRIT DMG by 23.0%. Moreover, after allies attack enemy targets, Robin additionally regenerates 2 Energy for herself.
skill_stages.name: Tonal Resonance

skill_stages.desc: After using Technique, creates a Special Dimension around the character that lasts for 15 seconds. Enemies within this dimension will not attack Robin and will follow Robin while the dimension is active. After entering battle while the dimension is active, Robin regenerates 5 Energy at the start of each wave. Only 1 Dimension Effect created by allies can exist at the same time.
skill_stages.name: Overture of Inebriation

skill_stages.desc: When the battle begins, action advances this character by 25%.
skill_stages.name: Coloratura Cadenza

skill_stages.desc: While the Concerto state is active, the CRIT DMG dealt when all allies launch Follow-up ATK increases by 25%.
skill_stages.name: Impromptu Flourish

skill_stages.desc: When using Skill, additionally regenerates 5 Energy.
skill_stages.name: Sequential Passage

equip.desc:
Flowing in the narrow border between "existence" and "nothingness," the ice-cold tides eternally lap against the shores and bring all things to their final end.

In this place, the drowned ask for help, lament with songs, find their happiness, enjoy sweet moments, and suffer great agony... All these are reflected in the water. She cannot experience these, but she can feel them —
There are still many roads to walk, many sounds to listen to, and many things to change before she arrives at the end.

She reaches out and saves the drowning from the temptations of Nihility, and one mirage after another bursts apart behind her figure.
She keeps walking in this boundless world, all for an end that does not exist.

— And it's always raining here.
equip.name: Along the Passing Shore

ornaments.desc: Encapsulated in the plane is Izumo, with its past and future severed with a slash. Izumo was once covered in indescribable wars of survival, as well as once being blessed with glorious days of bountiful luxury... Now, the barren land is nowhere to be found, leaving behind only a graveyard of swords where the past lies buried.
ornaments.name: Izumo's Magatsu no Morokami

ornaments.desc: The people of Izumo use tassels to bind the sharp blades to their belts. They walk the world to hunt down Kami with their blades, then used the divine carcasses to forge new blades... In this never-ending cycle, Izumo marches toward prosperity, towards disillusion, and towards the void.
ornaments.name: Izumo's Blades of Origin and End

ranks.desc: When dealing DMG to debuffed enemies, increases CRIT Rate by 18%.
ranks.name: Silenced Sky Spake Sooth

ranks.desc: The number of Nihility characters required for the Trace "The Abyss" to achieve its highest possible effect is reduced by 1. When this unit's turn starts, gains 1 point of Slashed Dream and inflicts 1 stack of Crimson Knot on the enemy with the most Crimson Knot stacks.
ranks.name: Mute Thunder in Still Tempest

ranks.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
ranks.name: Frost Bites in Death

ranks.desc: When enemy targets enter combat, inflicts them with the Ultimate DMG Vulnerability, increasing the amount of Ultimate DMG they take by 8%.
ranks.name: Shrined Fire for Mirrored Soul

ranks.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
ranks.name: Strewn Souls on Erased Earths

ranks.desc: Increases the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt by Acheron by 20%. The DMG dealt by Basic ATK and Skill will also be considered as Ultimate DMG and can Reduce enemy Toughness regardless of Weakness Types. When breaking Weaknesses, triggers the Lightning Weakness Break effect.
ranks.name: Apocalypse, the Emancipator

relics.desc: A heavy diving helmet in a style common in Orkron. Through the small porthole, one can only see the unbearable and endless expanse of darkness.
relics.name: Pioneer's Heatproof Shell

relics.desc: A compass in the form of a wristwatch. The magnetic needle has been removed and can no longer point in any direction.
relics.name: Pioneer's Lacuna Compass

relics.desc: A heavy diving suit crafted from scrap iron, airtight and impenetrable. Even its wearer often jests that it resembles more of a deep-sea coffin.
relics.name: Pioneer's Sealed Lead Apron

relics.desc: The heavy boots are formed like the anchor of a ship. Its owner is prepared to never return to the surface.
relics.name: Pioneer's Starfaring Anchor

skill_stages.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 110% of Acheron's ATK to a single target enemy.
skill_stages.name: Trilateral Wiltcross

skill_stages.desc: Gains 1 point(s) of Slashed Dream. Inflicts 1 stack(s) of Crimson Knot on a single target enemy, dealing Lightning DMG equal to 176% of Acheron's ATK to this target, as well as Lightning DMG equal to 66% of Acheron's ATK to adjacent targets.
skill_stages.name: Octobolt Flash

skill_stages.desc:
Sequentially unleash Rainblade 3 times and Stygian Resurge 1 time, dealing Lightning DMG up to 401% of Acheron's ATK to a single target enemy, as well as Lightning DMG up to 324% of Acheron's ATK to other targets.

Rainblade: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 25.9% of Acheron's ATK to a single target enemy and removes up to 3 stacks of Crimson Knot from the target. When Crimson Knot is removed, immediately deals Lightning DMG equal to 16.2% of Acheron's ATK to all enemies. For every stack of Crimson Knot removed, this DMG Multiplier is additionally increased, up to a maximum of 64.8%.

Stygian Resurge: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 129% of Acheron's ATK to all enemies and remove all Crimson Knots.

Crimson Knot cannot be applied to enemies during the Ultimate.
skill_stages.name: Slashed Dream Cries in Red

skill_stages.desc:
When Slashed Dream reaches 9 point(s), the Ultimate can be activated. During the Ultimate, reduces enemies' Toughness regardless of Weakness Types and reduces all enemies' All-Type RES by 22%, lasting until the end of the Ultimate.
When any unit inflicts debuffs on an enemy target while using their ability, Acheron gains 1 point of Slashed Dream and inflicts 1 stack of Crimson Knot on a target. If debuffs are inflicted on multiple targets, then the 1 stack of Crimson Knot will be inflicted on the enemy target with the most Crimson Knot stacks. This effect can only trigger once for every ability use.
After an enemy target exits the field or gets defeated by any unit while Acheron is on the field, their Crimson Knot stacks will be transferred to the enemy target with the most Crimson Knot stacks on the whole field.
skill_stages.name: Atop Rainleaf Hangs Oneness

skill_stages.desc:
Immediately attacks the enemy. At the start of each wave, gains Quadrivalent Ascendance, dealing Lightning DMG equal to 200% of Acheron's ATK to all enemies and reducing Toughness of all enemies irrespective of Weakness Types. When breaking Weaknesses, triggers the Lightning Weakness Break effect.
Quadrivalent Ascendance: After using the Ultimate, Acheron gains 1 point(s) of Slashed Dream and inflicts 1 stack(s) of Crimson Knot on a single random enemy.
If attacking a normal enemy, immediately defeats them without entering combat. When not hitting enemies, no Technique Points are consumed.
skill_stages.name: Quadrivalent Ascendance

skill_stages.desc: When battle starts, immediately gains 5 point(s) of Slashed Dream and applies 5 stack(s) of Crimson Knot to a random enemy. When Slashed Dream reaches its upper limit, for every point of Slashed Dream that exceeds the limit, gains 1 stack of Quadrivalent Ascendance. Enables Quadrivalent Ascendance to stack up to 3 time(s).
skill_stages.name: Red Oni

skill_stages.desc: When there are 1 or 2 Nihility characters other than Acheron in the team, the DMG dealt by Acheron's Basic ATK, Skill, and Ultimate increases to 115% or 160% of the original DMG respectively.
skill_stages.name: The Abyss

skill_stages.desc: When the Ultimate's Rainblade hits enemy targets that have Crimson Knot, the DMG dealt by Acheron increases by 30%, stacking up to 3 time(s) and lasting for 3 turn(s). And when Stygian Resurge triggers, additionally deals DMG for 6 times. Each time deals Lightning DMG equal to 25% of Acheron's ATK to a single random enemy and is considered as Ultimate DMG.
skill_stages.name: Thunder Core

equip.desc: Light the candles, spread the cards, breathe in the fragrance... These broken memories become faces in the dancing light. The apparitions that emerge from flames tell her of pasts fondly recalled. Time is shorn. The moment is frozen. She turns these most precious instants into crystallizations of eternity. "There is too much lost, and too little that remains... We nurture remembrance against the cruelties of time."
equip.name: Reforged Remembrance

ornaments.desc: The IPC's headquarters at Pier Point is sealed within a Planar Sphere. No planet can hide from the grand business plan of the Interastral Peace Corporation. They ventured into deep space to harvest the power of the entire universe.
ornaments.name: The IPC's Mega HQ

ornaments.desc: With the convenient help of the credit system, interstellar commerce was established. The Interastral Peace Corporation connected the stars with economic activity and expanded the borders of trade.
ornaments.name: The IPC's Trade Route

ranks.desc: While Black Swan is active in battle, enemies afflicted with Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock will have their corresponding Wind, Physical, Fire, or Lightning RES respectively reduced by 25%.
ranks.name: Seven Pillars of Wisdom

ranks.desc: When an enemy target afflicted with "Arcana" is defeated, there is a 100% base chance of inflicting 6 stack(s) of "Arcana" on adjacent targets.
ranks.name: Weep Not For Me, My Lamb

ranks.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
ranks.name: As Above, So Below

ranks.desc: While in the Epiphany state, enemy targets have their Effect RES reduced by 10% and Black Swan regenerates 8 Energy at the start of these targets' turns or when they are defeated. This Energy Regeneration effect can only trigger up to 1 time while Epiphany lasts. The trigger count is reset when Epiphany is applied again.
ranks.name: In Tears We Gift

ranks.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
ranks.name: Linnutee Flyway

ranks.desc:
When an enemy target is attacked by Black Swan's teammates, Black Swan has a 65% base chance of inflicting 1 stack of "Arcana" on the target.
Every time Black Swan inflicts "Arcana" on an enemy target, there is a 50% fixed chance to additionally increase the number of "Arcana" stacked this time by 1.
ranks.name: Pantheon Merciful, Masses Pitiful

relics.desc: A muzzle designed to tightly encage the captive's beastly visage, guarding against the feral fangs that yearn to inflict harm.
relics.name: Prisoner's Sealed Muzzle

relics.desc: Heavy shackles that tightly bind the evildoer's hands with steel needles pinning into the wrists, preventing the vicious claws from doing harm again.
relics.name: Prisoner's Leadstone Shackles

relics.desc: A prisoner's garment that restrains dangerous criminals. Its reversed-joint design confines the prisoner's body.
relics.name: Prisoner's Repressive Straitjacket

relics.desc: Metal shackles that bind the feet of the beasts, imprisoning evils and preventing them from escaping and wrecking havoc.
relics.name: Prisoner's Restrictive Fetters

skill_stages.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to 66% of Black Swan's ATK to a single target enemy, with a 68% base chance of inflicting 1 stack of Arcana on the target. Additionally, when attacking a target that suffers Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock, there is respectively a 68% base chance of inflicting 1 extra stack of Arcana on the target.
skill_stages.name: Percipience, Silent Dawn

skill_stages.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to 99% of Black Swan's ATK to a single target enemy and any adjacent targets. At the same time, there is a 100% base chance of inflicting 1 stack of Arcana on the target enemy and the adjacent targets. Additionally, there is a 100% base chance of reducing the DEF of the target enemy and the adjacent targets by 22.0%, lasting for 3 turn(s).
skill_stages.name: Decadence, False Twilight

skill_stages.desc:
Inflicts Epiphany on all enemies for 2 turn(s).
While afflicted with Epiphany, enemies take 27% increased DMG in their turn. Additionally, if enemies are also inflicted with Arcana, they are considered to be simultaneously afflicted with Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, and Shock. After Arcana causes DMG at the start of each turn, its stacks are not reset. This non-reset effect of Arcana stacks can be triggered up to 1 time(s) for the duration of Epiphany. And the trigger count resets when Epiphany is applied again.
Deals Wind DMG equal to 129% of Black Swan's ATK to all enemies.
skill_stages.name: Bliss of Otherworld's Embrace

skill_stages.desc:
Every time an enemy target receives DoT at the start of each turn, there is a 68% base chance for it to be inflicted with 1 stack of Arcana.
While afflicted with Arcana, enemy targets receive Wind DoT equal to 264% of Black Swan's ATK at the start of each turn. Each stack of Arcana increases this DMG multiplier by 13.2%. Then Arcana resets to 1 stack. Arcana can stack up to 50 times.
Only when Arcana causes DMG at the start of an enemy target's turn, Black Swan triggers additional effects based on the number of Arcana stacks inflicted on the target:
When there are 3 or more Arcana stacks, deals Wind DoT equal to 198% of Black Swan's ATK to adjacent targets, with a 68% base chance of inflicting 1 stack of Arcana on adjacent targets.
When there are 7 or more Arcana stacks, enables the current DoT dealt this time to ignore 20% of the target's and adjacent targets' DEF.
skill_stages.name: Loom of Fate's Caprice

skill_stages.desc: After this Technique is used, there is a 150% base chance for each enemy to be inflicted with 1 stack of Arcana at the start of the next battle. For each successful application of Arcana on a target, inflicts another stack of Arcana on the same target. This process repeats until Arcana fails to be inflicted on this target. For each successive application of Arcana on a target, its base chance of success is equal to 50% of the base chance of the previous successful infliction of Arcana on that target.
skill_stages.name: From Façade to Vérité

skill_stages.desc: After using Skill to attack one designated enemy that has Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock, each of these debuffs respectively has a 65% base chance of inflicting 1 extra stack of Arcana.
skill_stages.name: Viscera's Disquiet

skill_stages.desc:
When an enemy target enters battle, there is a 65% base chance for it to be inflicted with 1 stack of Arcana.
Every time an enemy target receives 1 instance of DoT during a single attack by an ally, there is a 65% base chance for the target to be inflicted with 1 stack of Arcana. The maximum number of stacks that can be inflicted during 1 single attack is 3.
skill_stages.name: Goblet's Dredges

skill_stages.desc: Increases this unit's DMG by an amount equal to 60% of Effect Hit Rate, up to a maximum DMG increase of 72%.
skill_stages.name: Candleflame's Portent

equip.desc: "First, overhaul the department's work habits." "Then, strictly implement rewards and penalties." "Of course, the most important part is figuring out everyone's tangled web of personal interests as soon as possible..." Though she was originally here to admire the scenery, her mind had unknowingly drifted toward work, with stress and trouble naturally following. She hurriedly ignites the soothing incense she always carried with her. "The world is so beautiful, yet I am so irritable... Best not to think of such miserable matters while on vacation..."
equip.name: Scent Alone Stays True

ornaments.desc: Encapsulated in the plane is the Flamewheel Forge, the location of the Xianzhou Zhuming's Artisanship Commission. A sphere the size of a celestial body, constructed around the progenitor of all heliobi, the Flint Emperor. Ingenious artisans draw energy from it and mold wondrous thoughts and inspirations into form.
ornaments.name: Forge's Lotus Lantern Wick

ornaments.desc: The heliobus progenitor, as grand in scope and size as a star, drowns in an endless dream. As it slumbers, the atoms and molecules around its body clash and spark, endlessly permeating outward from the external shell crafted from the Flamewheel, ultimately appearing as iridescent light bands resembling strands of celestial silk.
ornaments.name: Forge's Heavenly Flamewheel Silk

ranks.desc: Lingsha's Weakness Break Efficiency increases by 50%. When an enemy unit's Weakness is Broken, reduces their DEF by 20%.
ranks.name: Bloom on Vileward Bouquet

ranks.desc: When using Ultimate, increases all allies' Break Effect by 40%, lasting for 3 turn(s).
ranks.name: Leisure in Carmine Smokeveil

ranks.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
ranks.name: Shine of Floral Wick

ranks.desc: When Fuyuan takes action, restores HP equal to 40% of Lingsha's ATK for the ally target whose current HP is the lowest.
ranks.name: Redolence from Canopied Banquet

ranks.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
ranks.name: Poise Atop Twists and Turns

ranks.desc: While "Fuyuan" is on the field, reduces all enemies' All-Type RES by 20%. When "Fuyuan" attacks, additionally deals 4 instance(s) of DMG, with each instance dealing Fire DMG equal to 50% of Lingsha's ATK and 5 Toughness Reduction to one random enemy. This prioritizes targets with both Toughness greater than 0 and Fire Weakness.
ranks.name: Arcadia Under Deep Seclusion

relics.desc: An iron helm that significantly enhances sensory signals, fusing the consciousness of the Glamoth Iron Cavalry together with their armor.
relics.name: Iron Cavalry's Homing Helm

relics.desc: A powerful iron wristguard that can crush insectoids. It is sharp and light while being hard and sturdy.
relics.name: Iron Cavalry's Crushing Wristguard

relics.desc: The fiery propulsion armor gives Glamoth's Iron Cavalry a flame hot enough to ignite the battlefield.
relics.name: Iron Cavalry's Silvery Armor

relics.desc: Mechanical greaves that combine destructive capacities with speed. They allow Glamoth's Iron Cavalry to leap high and concentrate their strength into a kick directed at a single point on the enemy.
relics.name: Iron Cavalry's Skywalk Greaves

skill_stages.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to 110% of Lingsha's ATK to a single target enemy.
skill_stages.name: Votive Incense

skill_stages.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to 88% of Lingsha's ATK to all enemies and at the same time, restores HP equal to 14.8% of Lingsha's ATK plus 467 for all allies. Fuyuan's action advances by 20%.
skill_stages.name: Smoke and Splendor

skill_stages.desc:
Inflicts "Befog" on all enemies. While in "Befog," targets receive 27% increased Break DMG, lasting for 2 turn(s).
Deals Fire DMG equal to 162% of Lingsha's ATK to all enemies, and at the same time restores HP equal to 12.8% of Lingsha's ATK plus 400 for all allies. Fuyuan's action advances by 100%.
skill_stages.name: Dripping Mistscape

skill_stages.desc:
When using Skill, summons Fuyuan, with an initial SPD of 90 and an initial action count of 3.
When taking action, Fuyuan launches Follow-up ATK, dealing Fire DMG equal to 82% of Lingsha's ATK to all enemies. Additionally deals Fire DMG equal to 82% of Lingsha's ATK to a single random enemy, and this DMG prioritizes targets that have both Toughness greater than 0 and Fire Weakness. Dispels 1 debuff(s) from all allies and restores HP equal to 12.8% of Lingsha's ATK plus 400.
Fuyuan's action count can accumulate up to 5. When the action count reaches 0 or when Lingsha is knocked down, Fuyuan disappears.
While Fuyuan is on the field, using Skill can increase Fuyuan's action count by 3.
skill_stages.name: Mistdance Manifest

skill_stages.desc: After using Technique, immediately summons Fuyuan at the start of the next battle and inflicts "Befog" on all enemies, lasting for 2 turn(s).
skill_stages.name: Wisps of Aurora

skill_stages.desc: Increases this unit's ATK or Outgoing Healing by an amount equal to 25%/10% of Break Effect, up to a maximum increase of 50%/20% respectively.
skill_stages.name: Vermilion Waft

skill_stages.desc: When using Basic ATK, additionally regenerates 10 Energy.
skill_stages.name: Sylvan Smoke

skill_stages.desc: While "Fuyuan" is on the field and any ally character takes DMG or consumes HP, if a character in the team has their current HP percentage lower than or equal to 60%, "Fuyuan" will immediately launch the Talent's Follow-up ATK against enemies. This does not consume Fuyuan's action count. This effect can trigger again after 2 turn(s).
skill_stages.name: Ember's Echo

equip.desc: "Pitiful, laughable slaves..." The Denizens of Abundance's legions come crashing upon the border like an avalanche, with Lupitoxin rushing toward the Verdant Knights like a tide, trying to arouse the deep-set fear hidden in the soldiers' hearts. Illusions of dread came forth, striking the wills of the warriors, compelling them to drop their blades and be seized by hesitation. But the front remains stalwart like a bronze wall, unstirred by the borisins' disdainful words. From among the soldiers, a single figure saunters forth. She moves her body at a slow pace, and the flags behind her rustle under the unseen killing intent. "The general... it's the general..." "General Feixiao..." "The Merlin's Claw!" These small cheers and calls then come together into a thunderous battle cry. "Always soaring! Forever triumphant!" She stands there, alone. A single figure, but imbued with the might of an entire army.
equip.name: I Venture Forth to Hunt

ornaments.desc: Encapsulated in the plane is the Golden Sky Tent belonging to the borisins of Verdantia. Different to the savage name that borisin left in the cosmos, the borisins of Verdantia possess outstanding biotechnology. The children of the wolves gather next to the great Brood Lord Duran, and regard the celestial objects in the sky as their herd as they gallop between the stars.
ornaments.name: Duran's Tent of Golden Sky

ornaments.desc: These were the reins, shackles, and whips. The first thing taught to borisin youths who had grown taller than war beasts' legs was to always grasp the reins tight in their hands, or else the youths themselves would become enslaved livestock — or worse, become feed.
ornaments.name: Duran's Mechabeast Bridle

ranks.desc: After launching "Boltsunder Blitz" or "Waraxe Skyward," additionally increases the Ultimate DMG dealt by Feixiao by an amount equal to 10% of the original DMG, stacking up to 5 time(s) and lasting until the end of the Ultimate action.
ranks.name: Skyward I Quell

ranks.desc: In the Talent's effect, for every 1 instance of Follow-up ATK launched by ally targets, Feixiao gains 1 point of "Flying Aureus." This effect can trigger up to 6 time(s) per turn.
ranks.name: Moonward I Wish

ranks.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
ranks.name: Starward I Bode

ranks.desc: The Toughness Reduction from the Talent's Follow-up ATK increases by 100% and, when launched, increases this unit's SPD by 8%, lasting for 2 turn(s).
ranks.name: Stormward I Hear

ranks.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
ranks.name: Heavenward I Leap

ranks.desc: Increases the All-Type RES PEN of Ultimate DMG dealt by Feixiao by 20%. Talent's Follow-up ATK DMG is considered as Ultimate DMG at the same time, and its DMG multiplier increases by 140%.
ranks.name: Homeward I Near

relics.desc: A face mask modeled after the ferocious bird "Dafeng." With its two pairs of auxiliary eyes, it has witnessed divine miracles.
relics.name: Valorous Mask of Northern Skies

relics.desc: A bionic gauntlet integrated with the body. To hunt fearsome beasts, one must possess claws sharper than those of the beasts themselves.
relics.name: Valorous Bracelet of Grappling Hooks

relics.desc: Like the cold wind, soaring above a pack of wolves with their heads held high. The hunter and the hunted will eventually switch places.
relics.name: Valorous Plate of Soaring Flight

relics.desc: Combat boots fashioned after talons. They allow the wearer to swiftly dash onto the battlefield like the wind, effortlessly traversing through thorns and rugged terrain.
relics.name: Valorous Greaves of Pursuing Hunt

skill_stages.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to 110% of Feixiao's ATK to a single target enemy.
skill_stages.name: Boltsunder

skill_stages.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to 220% of Feixiao's ATK to a single target enemy. Then, immediately launches 1 extra instance of Talent's Follow-up ATK against the target.
skill_stages.name: Waraxe

skill_stages.desc:
Deals Wind DMG to a single target enemy, up to 759% of Feixiao's ATK. During this time, can ignore Weakness Type to reduce the target's Toughness. When the target is not Weakness Broken, Feixiao's Weakness Break Efficiency increases by 100%.
During the attack, Feixiao first launches "Boltsunder Blitz" or "Waraxe Skyward" on the target, for a total of 6 time(s).
At the end, deals Wind DMG equal to 172% of Feixiao's ATK to the target.
skill_stages.name: Terrasplit

skill_stages.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to 64% of Feixiao's ATK to the chosen target. If the target is Weakness Broken, the DMG multiplier increases by 33%.
skill_stages.name: Boltsunder Blitz

skill_stages.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to 64% of Feixiao's ATK to the chosen target. If the target is not Weakness Broken, the DMG multiplier increases by 33%.
skill_stages.name: Waraxe Skyward

skill_stages.desc:
Can activate Ultimate when "Flying Aureus" reaches 6 points, accumulating up to 12 points. Feixiao gains 1 point of "Flying Aureus" for every 2 attacks by ally targets. Feixiao's Ultimate attacks do not count towards this number.
After Feixiao's teammates attack an Enemy target, Feixiao immediately launches Follow-up ATK against the primary target, dealing Wind DMG equal to 121% of Feixiao's ATK. If there is no primary target available to attack, Feixiao attacks a single random enemy instead. This effect can only trigger once per turn and the trigger count resets at the start of Feixiao's turn. When using this attack, increases DMG dealt by this unit by 66%, lasting for 2 turn(s).
skill_stages.name: Thunderhunt

skill_stages.desc:
After using Technique, enters the "Onrush" state, lasting for 20 seconds. While in "Onrush," pulls in enemies within a certain range, and increases this unit's movement speed by 50%. After entering battle, gains 1 point(s) of "Flying Aureus."
While in "Onrush," actively attacking will start battle with all pulled enemies. After entering battle, deals Wind DMG equal to 200% of Feixiao's ATK to all enemies at the start of each wave. This DMG is guaranteed to CRIT. If more than 1 enemy is pulled in, increases the multiplier of this DMG by 100% for each additional enemy pulled in, up to a maximum of 1000%.
skill_stages.name: Stormborn

skill_stages.desc:
When the battle starts, gains 3 point(s) of "Flying Aureus."
At the start of a turn, if no Follow-up ATK was launched via Talent in the previous turn, then this counts as 1 toward the number of attacks required to gain "Flying Aureus."
skill_stages.name: Heavenpath

skill_stages.desc: When using Ultimate to deal DMG to an enemy target, it is considered as a Follow-up ATK. Follow-up ATKs' CRIT DMG increases by 36%.
skill_stages.name: Formshift

skill_stages.desc: When using Skill, increases ATK by 48%, lasting for 3 turn(s).
skill_stages.name: Boltcatch

equip.desc:
The girl hides behind the door and dares not move one step closer. 
Perhaps due to the fact that tonight's objective is already within her reach, her heart is actually beating faster.
"I'm not scared, not scared, not scared..."
In darkness, silence lets out a piercing scream.

The girl is shivering and grasps the "weapon" in her hands tight, but still does not dare to approach the "target."
"There is nothing to be s—s—scared of!"

The tail behind her has finally had enough and suddenly lights up.
"Hurry up. You're just picking up a delivery!"
equip.name: Night of Fright

ornaments.desc: The Xianzhou Luofu floating above the seas of stars was enclosed within the sphere. Skiffs went to and fro through the Jade Gate just like the celestial movements of stars and moons. Countless people had come here to seek the secrets of immortality, only to return in disappointment.
ornaments.name: The Xianzhou Luofu's Celestial Ark

ornaments.desc: Once, the Luofu reigned supreme over other ships in the Xianzhou fleet due to the grace of the Ambrosial Arbor. Later, when people consumed the cursed fruit of immortality, calamity was brought upon the Luofu by the Ambrosial Arbor, whose vines had already entrapped the Luofu in its firm and inseparable grip.
ornaments.name: The Xianzhou Luofu's Ambrosial Arbor Vines

ranks.desc: The duration of Divine Provision produced by the Talent is extended by 1 turn(s). When Huohuo possesses Divine Provision, all allies' SPD increases by 12%.
ranks.name: Anchored to Vessel, Specters Nestled

ranks.desc: If Huohuo possesses "Divine Provision" when an ally target is struck by a killing blow, the ally will not be knocked down and their HP will immediately be restored by an amount equal to 50% of their Max HP. This reduces the duration of "Divine Provision" by 1 turn. This effect can only be triggered 2 time(s) per battle.
ranks.name: Sealed in Tail, Wraith Subdued

ranks.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
ranks.name: Cursed by Fate, Moths to Flame

ranks.desc: When healing a target ally via Skill or Talent, the less HP the target ally currently has, the higher the amount of healing they will receive. The maximum increase in healing provided by Huohuo is 80%.
ranks.name: Tied in Life, Bound to Strife

ranks.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
ranks.name: Mandated by Edict, Evils Evicted

ranks.desc: When healing a target ally, increases the target ally's DMG dealt by 50% for 2 turn(s).
ranks.name: Woven Together, Cohere Forever

relics.desc: A withered twig that was used as a hairstick, with new flower buds sprouting on the end. Now, the past is long gone, and the stick inlaid with parcel-gilt flower buds commemorates the beginning of a new life.
relics.name: Passerby's Rejuvenated Wooden Hairstick

relics.desc: Bracers made from flowing coral gold and the leather of unknown beasts. Only master artisans from the Vidyadhara dragon race can create this kind of superior armor.
relics.name: Passerby's Roaming Dragon Bracer

relics.desc: An old coat with a ragged hemline. The embroidery has been ruined by blade marks. Flesh heals quickly, but a coat does not, nor does a person's pain.
relics.name: Passerby's Ragged Embroided Coat

relics.desc: A durable pair of boots that have left shoe-prints on many worlds and have witnessed many lethal situations.
relics.name: Passerby's Stygian Hiking Boots

skill_stages.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to 55% of Huohuo's Max HP to a target enemy.
skill_stages.name: Banner: Stormcaller

skill_stages.desc: Dispels 1 debuff(s) from a single target ally and immediately restores this ally's HP by an amount equal to 22.4% of Huohuo's Max HP plus 623. At the same time, restores HP for allies that are adjacent to this target ally by an amount equal to 17.9% of Huohuo's Max HP plus 498.
skill_stages.name: Talisman: Protection

skill_stages.desc: Regenerates Energy for all teammates (i.e., excluding this unit) by an amount equal to 21.0% of their respective Max Energy. At the same time, increases their ATK by 43.2% for 2 turn(s).
skill_stages.name: Tail: Spiritual Domination

skill_stages.desc:
After using her Skill, Huohuo gains Divine Provision, lasting for 2 turn(s). This duration decreases by 1 turn at the start of Huohuo's every turn. If Huohuo has Divine Provision when an ally's turn starts or when an ally uses their Ultimate, restores HP for that ally by an amount equal to 4.8% of Huohuo's Max HP plus 133. At the same time, every ally with 50% HP percentage or lower receives healing once.
When Divine Provision is triggered to heal an ally, dispel 1 debuff(s) from that ally. This effect can be triggered up to 6 time(s). Using the skill again resets the effect's trigger count.
skill_stages.name: Possession: Ethereal Metaflow

skill_stages.desc: Huohuo terrorizes surrounding enemies, afflicting Horror-Struck on them. Enemies in Horror-Struck will flee away from Huohuo for 10 second(s). When entering battle with enemies in Horror-Struck, there is a 100% base chance of reducing every single enemy's ATK by 25% for 2 turn(s).
skill_stages.name: Fiend: Impeachment of Evil

skill_stages.desc: When battle starts, Huohuo gains Divine Provision, lasting for 1 turn(s).
skill_stages.name: Fearful to Act

skill_stages.desc: Increases the chance to resist Crowd Control debuffs by 35%.
skill_stages.name: The Cursed One

skill_stages.desc: When her Talent is triggered to heal allies, Huohuo regenerates 1 Energy.
skill_stages.name: Stress Reaction to Horror

equip.desc: The blade shattered, plunging into the bone-chilling cold. All earthly instruments are mere futilities, their worth discernible with a single glance. "What use do I have of swords?" She holds no attachment, nor does her gaze accommodate anything within. "From now on, I shall be my own sword." To transcend perceived precipices and achieve unprecedented breakthroughs, one must regard themselves as "kindling" to fuel their own fire.
equip.name: I Shall Be My Own Sword

ornaments.desc: Encapsulated in the plane is the most advanced arena on Planet Taikiyan — the Taikiyan Stadium. The atmosphere is lively both inside and outside the dome as flags wave in the air. With all eyes on the arena, an exciting game of Roboball is about to kick off.
ornaments.name: Taikiyan Laser Stadium

ornaments.desc: The Taikiyan Stadium's standard race track is usually made with a metal structure covered with smooth concrete and natural wooden floors. A large amount of transparent polycarbonate material was used in the construction of the stadium to give the audience an unobstructed view of the games.
ornaments.name: Taikiyan's Arclight Race Track

ranks.desc: When using her Ultimate or Enhanced Skill, Jingliu's CRIT DMG increases by 24% for 1 turn(s). If only one enemy target is attacked, the target will additionally be dealt Ice DMG equal to 100% of Jingliu's ATK.
ranks.name: Moon Crashes Tianguan Gate

ranks.desc: After using Ultimate, increases the DMG of the next Enhanced Skill by 80%.
ranks.name: Crescent Shadows Qixing Dipper

ranks.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
ranks.name: Halfmoon Gapes Mercurial Haze

ranks.desc: During the Spectral Transmigration state, the ATK gained from consuming teammates' HP is additionally increased by 90% of the total HP consumed from the entire team. The cap for ATK gained this way also increases by 30%.
ranks.name: Lunarlance Shines Skyward Dome

ranks.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
ranks.name: Night Shades Astral Radiance

ranks.desc: When Jingliu enters the Spectral Transmigration state, the Syzygy stack limit increases by 1, and Jingliu obtains 1 stack(s) of Syzygy. While she is in the Spectral Transmigration state, her CRIT DMG increases by 50%.
ranks.name: Eclipse Hollows Corporeal Husk

relics.desc: A crystal monocle reflecting a grand building, demonstrating its owner's sophistication and erudition along with the cane, bracelet, and brooch.
relics.name: Scholar's Silver-Rimmed Monocle

relics.desc: An exoskeleton crafted from an alloy that aids finger movements, tailored to the user's hand and of significant value.
relics.name: Scholar's Auxiliary Knuckle

relics.desc: Tweed jackets paired with knitwear are a commonplace attire at the academy. For visiting scholars, its durable fabric is an ideal choice.
relics.name: Scholar's Tweed Jacket

relics.desc: These cozy and stylish women's boots have accompanied their owner on polar expeditions for years, being perfectly in-fashion when paired with calf-length pants.
relics.name: Scholar's Felt Snowboots

skill_stages.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 100% of Jingliu's ATK to a single enemy.
skill_stages.name: Lucent Moonglow

skill_stages.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 200% of Jingliu's ATK to a single enemy and obtains 1 stack(s) of Syzygy.
skill_stages.name: Transcendent Flash

skill_stages.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 250% of Jingliu's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Ice DMG equal to 125% of Jingliu's ATK to adjacent enemies. Consumes 1 stack(s) of Syzygy. Using this ability does not consume Skill Points.
skill_stages.name: Moon On Glacial River

skill_stages.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 300% of Jingliu's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Ice DMG equal to 150% of Jingliu's ATK to any adjacent enemies. Gains 1 stack(s) of Syzygy after attack ends.
skill_stages.name: Florephemeral Dreamflux

skill_stages.desc: When Jingliu has 2 stack(s) of Syzygy, she enters the Spectral Transmigration state with her action advanced by 100% and her CRIT Rate increases by 50%. Then, Jingliu's Skill "Transcendent Flash" is enhanced to "Moon On Glacial River," and only this enhanced Skill is available for use in battle. When Jingliu uses an attack in the Spectral Transmigration state, she consumes HP from her teammates equal to 4% of their respective Max HP (this cannot reduce teammates' HP to lower than 1). Jingliu's ATK increases by 540% of the total HP consumed from all allies in this attack, capped at 180% of her base ATK, lasting until the current attack ends. Jingliu cannot enter the Spectral Transmigration state again until the current Spectral Transmigration state ends. Syzygy can stack up to 3 times. When Syzygy stacks become 0, Jingliu will exit the Spectral Transmigration state.
skill_stages.name: Crescent Transmigration

skill_stages.desc: After using this Technique, creates a Special Dimension around Jingliu that lasts for 20 seconds, and all enemies in this Special Dimension will become Frozen. After entering combat with enemies in the Special Dimension, Jingliu immediately regenerates 15 Energy and obtains 1 stack(s) of Syzygy, with a 100% base chance of Freezing enemy targets for 1 turn(s). While Frozen, enemy targets cannot take action, and receive Ice Additional DMG equal to 80% of Jingliu's ATK at the start of every turn. Only 1 Dimension Effect created by allies can exist at the same time.
skill_stages.name: Shine of Truth

skill_stages.desc: While in the Spectral Transmigration state, increases Effect RES by 35%.
skill_stages.name: Deathrealm

skill_stages.desc: After using "Transcendent Flash," the next action advances by 10%.
skill_stages.name: Sword Champion

skill_stages.desc: While in the Spectral Transmigration state, increases DMG dealt by Ultimate by 20%.
skill_stages.name: Frost Wraith

equip.desc:
She had spent many days next to the window.

Flowers were blooming outside when she made gentle medicines with mint and nepeta.
Rain was falling outside when she made strong medicines with mosla and ginger.
Leaves were falling outside when she made sour medicines with peony roots and dry plums.
And snow was falling outside when she made bitter medicines with skullcaps and anemarrhena.

Time flows endlessly, but this window and the person sitting next to it remain forever the same.
equip.name: Time Waits for No One

ornaments.desc: The Xianzhou Luofu floating above the seas of stars was enclosed within the sphere. Skiffs went to and fro through the Jade Gate just like the celestial movements of stars and moons. Countless people had come here to seek the secrets of immortality, only to return in disappointment.
ornaments.name: The Xianzhou Luofu's Celestial Ark

ornaments.desc: Once, the Luofu reigned supreme over other ships in the Xianzhou fleet due to the grace of the Ambrosial Arbor. Later, when people consumed the cursed fruit of immortality, calamity was brought upon the Luofu by the Ambrosial Arbor, whose vines had already entrapped the Luofu in its firm and inseparable grip.

ranks.desc: If the target ally's current HP is equal to their Max HP when Invigoration ends, regenerates 8 extra Energy for this target.
ranks.name: Ambrosial Aqua

ranks.desc: After using her Ultimate, Bailu's Outgoing Healing increases by an additional 15% for 2 turn(s).

Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

ranks.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
ranks.name: Waning Worries

ranks.desc: Bailu can heal allies who received a killing blow 1 more time(s) in a single battle.
ranks.name: Drooling Drop of Draconic Divinity

relics.desc: The shape is exactly like a ski goggle. Not only does it have anti-glare properties, it can also be used to watch virtual live streams.
relics.name: Messenger's Holovisor

relics.desc: A cybernetic prosthetic arm that can be disassembled at will. Capable of firing knuckles like bullets.
relics.name: Messenger's Transformative Arm

relics.desc: A trendy courier satchel. It's adorned with many cute accessories.
relics.name: Messenger's Secret Satchel

relics.desc: A pair of sneakers that support parkour activities. It is comfortable, and that is all it needs.
relics.name: Messenger's Par-kool Sneakers

skill_stages.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 100% of Bailu's ATK to a single enemy.
skill_stages.name: Diagnostic Kick

skill_stages.desc: Heals a single ally for 11.7% of Bailu's Max HP plus 312. Bailu then heals random allies 2 time(s). After each healing, HP restored from the next healing is reduced by 15%.
skill_stages.name: Singing Among Clouds

skill_stages.desc:
Heals all allies for 13.5% of Bailu's Max HP plus 360.
Bailu applies Invigoration to allies that are not already Invigorated. For those already Invigorated, Bailu extends the duration of their Invigoration by 1 turn.
The effect of Invigoration can last for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot stack.
skill_stages.name: Felicitous Thunderleap

skill_stages.desc:
After an ally target with Invigoration is hit, restores the ally's HP for 5.4% of Bailu's Max HP plus 144. This effect can trigger 2 time(s).
When Bailu's teammate receives a killing blow, they will not be knocked down. Bailu immediately heals the ally for 18.0% of Bailu's Max HP plus 480 HP. This effect can be triggered 1 time per battle.
skill_stages.name: Gourdful of Elixir

skill_stages.desc: After Technique is used, at the start of the next battle, all allies are granted Invigoration for 2 turn(s).
skill_stages.name: Saunter in the Rain

skill_stages.desc: When Bailu heals a target ally above their normal Max HP, the target's Max HP increases by 10% for 2 turns.

skill_stages.desc: Invigoration can trigger 1 more time(s).
skill_stages.name: Vidyadhara Ichor Lines

skill_stages.desc: Characters with Invigoration receive 10% less DMG.
skill_stages.name: Aquatic Benediction

equip.desc: A young girl smiles subtly. "How?" "Right here, right now, I am alone..." "But it feels... very lively."
equip.name: In the Night

ornaments.name: Taikiyan Laser Stadium

A large amount of transparent polycarbonate material was used in the construction of the stadium to give the audience an unobstructed view of the games.

ranks.desc: The SPD Boost effect of Seele's Skill can stack up to 2 time(s).
ranks.name: Dancing Butterfly

ranks.name: Flitting Phantasm

Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

ranks.desc:
After Seele uses Ultimate, inflict the attacked enemy with "Butterfly Flurry" for 1 turn(s). Enemies in "Butterfly Flurry" will additionally take 1 instance of Quantum Additional DMG equal to 15% of Seele's Ultimate DMG every time they are attacked. If the target is defeated by the "Butterfly Flurry" state's Additional DMG triggered by other allies' attacks, Seele's Talent will not be triggered.
When Seele is knocked down, the "Butterfly Flurry" inflicted on the enemies will be removed.
ranks.name: Shattering Shambles

relics.desc: A pair of communication goggles embedded with ultraremote sensing technology that breaks through the shackles of limited transmission and remote distances.

relics.desc: Diving-suit-like attire that envelops the body when activated, sending neural signals from your whole body to the metafield in real time.
relics.name: Genius's Metafield Suit

relics.desc: A wearable gravity-capture device. It is shaped like a pair of ice skates that reflects the stars' twinkling lights during quick gliding.
relics.name: Genius's Gravity Walker

skill_stages.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to 110% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.
skill_stages.name: Thwack

skill_stages.desc: Increases Seele's SPD by 25% for 2 turn(s) and deals Quantum DMG equal to 242% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.
skill_stages.name: Sheathed Blade

skill_stages.desc: Seele enters the Amplification state and deals Quantum DMG equal to 459% of her ATK to a single enemy.
skill_stages.name: Butterfly Flurry

skill_stages.desc:
Enters the Amplification state upon defeating an enemy with Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, and receives an extra turn. While in the Amplification state, the DMG of Seele's attacks increases by 88% for 1 turn(s).
Enemies defeated in the extra turn provided by "Resurgence" will not trigger another "Resurgence."
skill_stages.name: Resurgence

skill_stages.desc: After using her Technique, Seele gains Stealth for 20 second(s). While Stealth is active, Seele cannot be detected by enemies. And when entering battle by attacking enemies, Seele will immediately enter the Amplification state.
skill_stages.name: Phantom Illusion

skill_stages.desc: When current HP percentage is 50% or lower, reduces the chance of being attacked by enemies.
skill_stages.name: Nightshade

skill_stages.desc: While Seele is in the Amplification state, her Quantum RES PEN increases by 20%.
skill_stages.name: Lacerate

skill_stages.desc: After using a Basic ATK, Seele's next action advances by 20%.
skill_stages.name: Rippling Waves

equip.desc: She leaves the cover of the awning, opens her umbrella, and dives into an alley while humming a lighthearted tune. The rain stops a little while after. She scratches her head and swipes her screen open. After a few taps, raindrops begin to fall in an area no wider than her umbrella. The pitter-patter sound of raindrops on the umbrella mixes with music from the game. All was calm and relaxing. "Gaming and rain totally go together."
equip.name: Incessant Rain

ornaments.desc: The IPC's headquarters at Pier Point is sealed within a Planar Sphere. No planet can hide from the grand business plan of the Interastral Peace Corporation. They ventured into deep space to harvest the power of the entire universe.
ornaments.name: The IPC's Mega HQ

ornaments.desc: With the convenient help of the credit system, interstellar commerce was established. The Interastral Peace Corporation connected the stars with economic activity and expanded the borders of trade.
ornaments.name: The IPC's Trade Route

ranks.desc: After using her Ultimate to attack enemies, Silver Wolf regenerates 7 Energy for every debuff that the target enemy currently has. This effect can be triggered up to 5 time(s) in each use of her Ultimate.
ranks.name: Social Engineering

ranks.desc: When an enemy enters battle, reduces their Effect RES by 20%.
ranks.name: Zombie Network

ranks.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
ranks.name: Payload

ranks.desc: After using her Ultimate to attack enemies, deals Quantum Additional DMG equal to 20% of Silver Wolf's ATK for every debuff currently on the enemy target. This effect can be triggered for a maximum of 5 time(s) during each use of her Ultimate.

ranks.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
ranks.name: Brute Force Attack

skill_stages.name: System Warning

skill_stages.desc:
There is a 87% base chance to add 1 Weakness of an on-field character's Type to the target enemy. This also reduces the enemy's DMG RES to that Weakness Type by 20% for 2 turn(s). If the enemy already has that Type Weakness, the effect of DMG RES reduction to that Weakness Type will not be triggered.
Each enemy can only have 1 Weakness implanted by Silver Wolf. When Silver Wolf implants another Weakness to the target, only the most recent implanted Weakness will be kept.
In addition, there is a 100% base chance to further reduce the All-Type RES of the enemy by 10.5% for 2 turn(s).
Deals Quantum DMG equal to 215% of Silver Wolf's ATK to this enemy.
skill_stages.name: Allow Changes?

skill_stages.desc: There's a 103% base chance to decrease the target enemy's DEF by 46.8% for 3 turn(s). And at the same time, deals Quantum DMG equal to 410% of Silver Wolf's ATK to the target enemy.
skill_stages.name: User Banned

skill_stages.desc:
Silver Wolf can create three types of Bugs: Reduce ATK by 11.0%, reduce DEF by 8.8%, and reduce SPD by 6.6%.
Every time Silver Wolf attacks, she has a 74% base chance to implant a random Bug that lasts for 3 turn(s) in an enemy target.
skill_stages.name: Awaiting System Response...

skill_stages.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Quantum DMG equal to 80% of Silver Wolf's ATK to all enemies, and ignores Weakness Types and reduces Toughness from all enemies. Enemies with their Weakness Broken in this way will trigger the Quantum Weakness Break effect.
skill_stages.name: Force Quit Program

skill_stages.desc: "Bug"'s duration is extended for 1 turn(s). Every time an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Silver Wolf has a 65% base chance of implanting a random "Bug" in the enemy.
skill_stages.name: Generate

skill_stages.desc: The duration of the Weakness implanted by Silver Wolf's Skill increases by 1 turn(s).
skill_stages.name: Inject

skill_stages.desc: If there are 3 or more debuff(s) affecting the enemy when the Skill is used, then the Skill decreases the enemy's All-Type RES by an additional 3%.
skill_stages.name: Side Note

equip.desc: "Could it be that there's something you haven't told me?" She watches as their neck stiffens, as if a lump is blocking their throat. She knows she is feared, and that no further step is needed. At this point, it no longer mattered what she said. Any word she utters radiates horror... They stand no chance against her, and have no choice but to blurt out what she wants to hear. Like a spider waiting in its web, patience is all she needs.
equip.name: Patience Is All You Need

ornaments.desc: Encapsulated in the Planar Sphere is the renowned shapeshifting oothecae of the Glamoth Empire's Iron Cavalry. Countless silver mechas were loaded into warships and sailed to the outer edges of the galaxy to fend off the vicious Swarm from deep space.
ornaments.name: Glamoth's Iron Cavalry Regiment

ornaments.desc: The flourishing Empire of Glamoth turned into dust. There was no evidence of its former glory. Only the debris of stardust, mechas, warships, and the corpses of the Swarm were left drifting in the vacuum to form a river of residua — preserving the original battle scene of the bloody warfronts and serving as a monument to its downfall.
ornaments.name: Glamoth's Silent Tombstone

ranks.name: Doloroso

relics.desc: A muzzle designed to tightly encage the captive's beastly visage, guarding against the feral fangs that yearn to inflict harm.
relics.name: Prisoner's Sealed Muzzle

relics.desc: Heavy shackles that tightly bind the evildoer's hands with steel needles pinning into the wrists, preventing the vicious claws from doing harm again.
relics.name: Prisoner's Leadstone Shackles

relics.desc: A prisoner's garment that restrains dangerous criminals. Its reversed-joint design confines the prisoner's body.
relics.name: Prisoner's Repressive Straitjacket

relics.desc: Metal shackles that bind the feet of the beasts, imprisoning evils and preventing them from escaping and wrecking havoc.
relics.name: Prisoner's Restrictive Fetters

skill_stages.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 110% of Kafka's ATK to a single enemy.
skill_stages.name: Midnight Tumult

If the target enemy is currently receiving DoT, all DoTs currently placed on that enemy immediately produce DMG equal to 78% of their original DMG.

While Shocked, enemies receive Lightning DoT equal to 318% of Kafka's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

skill_stages.desc: Immediately attacks all enemies within a set range. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Kafka's ATK to all enemies, with a 100% base chance to inflict Shock equivalent to that applied by her Ultimate on every enemy target for 2 turn(s).
skill_stages.name: Mercy Is Not Forgiveness

skill_stages.desc: When the Ultimate is used, enemy targets will now receive DMG immediately from all currently applied DoT sources instead of just receiving DMG immediately from the currently applied Shock state.
skill_stages.name: Torture

skill_stages.desc: If an enemy is defeated while Shocked, Kafka additionally regenerates 5 Energy.
skill_stages.name: Plunder

skill_stages.desc: The base chance for target enemies to be Shocked by the Ultimate, the Technique, and the Talent-triggered Follow-up ATK increases by 30%.
skill_stages.name: Thorns

equip.desc:
If you are concerned for the road, just look up again.
When the stars look gently down, the heart would already be soaring.
Every thought and every whisper,
becomes a life experience that would never leave.
equip.name: Night on the Milky Way

ornaments.desc: Encapsulated in the Planar Sphere is the renowned shapeshifting oothecae of the Glamoth Empire's Iron Cavalry. Countless silver mechas were loaded into warships and sailed to the outer edges of the galaxy to fend off the vicious Swarm from deep space.

At the start of the battle, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge.

After entering battle with enemies in the Special Dimension, there is a 100% base chance to increase Fire DMG taken by enemies by 10% for 2 turn(s). Only 1 Dimension Effect created by allies can exist at the same time.

After using an attack, there is a 50% base chance to inflict Burn on enemies, lasting for 2 turn(s).
When afflicted with Burn, enemies take Fire DoT equal to 30% of Himeko's ATK at the start of each turn.

skill_stages.desc: Skill deals 20% more DMG to enemies currently afflicted with Burn.

skill_stages.desc: When current HP percentage is 80% or higher, CRIT Rate increases by 15%.

equip.desc: "Remember, the war with the monsters cannot be won by retreating." "We are the last defense, the final iron wall between them and Belobog..." "We cannot retreat under any circumstances!" She looks up to see the frozen earth and endless winter ahead. Business as usual. Only that... the figure at which she had been gazing is gone.
equip.name: But the Battle Isn't Over

ornaments.desc: Encapsulated in the plane is the Insumousu Autonomous Region of Thalassa. The Xianzhou Daiyu had crashed here, inspiring the civilization of Insumousu.
ornaments.name: Insumousu's Whalefall Ship

ornaments.desc: The fallen Xianzhou Daiyu is forever anchored in a foreign land. Perhaps it is time to untie its mooring ropes and let it return home.
ornaments.name: Insumousu's Frayed Hawser

skill_stages.desc: Tingyun immediately regenerates 5 Energy at the start of her turn.
skill_stages.name: Jubilant Passage

equip.desc: How much longer until the action starts? You have the nerve to ask a question like that... is something wrong with the new recruit? No. Elio didn't choose her because she was good at field work, but she has to at least survive this rookie assignment. She's cruising. Then I'm relieved. It seems that Bladie has proved to be a reliable operative as well. ...
equip.name: Before the Tutorial Mission Starts

equip.desc: "You're awake... Thank you." "You... saved my life, Natasha. The one who should be saying thanks... is me." "No, I should be thanking you... for holding on until I finished the surgery." The doctor and patient smiled wearily at each other and said nothing more.

ornaments.desc: The Xianzhou Luofu floating above the seas of stars was enclosed within the sphere. Skiffs went to and fro through the Jade Gate just like the celestial movements of stars and moons. Countless people had come here to seek the secrets of immortality, only to return in disappointment.
ornaments.name: The Xianzhou Luofu's Celestial Ark

ornaments.desc: Once, the Luofu reigned supreme over other ships in the Xianzhou fleet due to the grace of the Ambrosial Arbor. Later, when people consumed the cursed fruit of immortality, calamity was brought upon the Luofu by the Ambrosial Arbor, whose vines had already entrapped the Luofu in its firm and inseparable grip.
ornaments.name: The Xianzhou Luofu's Ambrosial Arbor Vines

Some people want to write a page in their notebook first. Some people want to play on their phone first. "All of you, eat while the food is hot!"
equip.name: The Seriousness of Breakfast

ornaments.desc: Encapsulated in the plane is the Herta Space Station. Parked above The Blue, it slowly drifts along its predetermined orbit, with the silent cosmos looking like a book waiting to be read.

ornaments.desc: Madam Herta lost all interest in the space station the moment it was complete. The station maintains a steady orbital velocity as it circles The Blue, leaving a track of its circular motion on the planet below.

equip.desc: He immediately falls in love with the golden vessel and is about to buy it, but the foxian girl drags him aside and whispers: "Please return at night, Mr. Benefactor, and make up your mind then." As promised, he returns at night. The same foxian girl opens the door and smiles at him. "Please follow me, Mr. Benefactor." A ray of moonlight shines onto the base of the etched plate. The artisan had traced the petals with lines of various depths, and he would not be able to see such details without the moonlight. He finally recalls why this item is called "Carve the Moon, Weave the Clouds."
equip.name: Carve the Moon, Weave the Clouds

ornaments.desc: Encapsulated in the plane is Penacony's main structure — the Reverie hotel. Guests staying here will travel to a world of sweet dreams and enjoy a feast of luxury and extravagance in a seemingly omnipotent metropolis.

ornaments.desc: In Penacony's dreamscape city, intricate tracks meander between buildings, supporting the Spheroids that visitors ride in, and connecting rich and diverse dreams together.
ornaments.name: Penacony's Dream-Seeking Tracks

Additionally, triggers the corresponding effect based on "Shifu"'s Path and then gains 1 point(s) of Charge. If there is no primary target available to attack, then she attacks a single random enemy instead. This effect can only trigger once per turn.

Energy regenerated from using Enhanced Basic ATK does not increase with the number of hits.
Enhanced Basic ATK cannot recover Skill Points.

Designates a single ally (excluding this unit) as "Shifu" and increases "Shifu"'s SPD by 6.8%. Only the most recent target of March 7th's Skill is considered as "Shifu."


Whenever using Basic ATK or dealing 1 hit of Enhanced Basic ATK's DMG, triggers the corresponding effect if "Shifu" with the specified Path is present on the field:

Erudition, Destruction, The Hunt, Remembrance: Deals Additional DMG (DMG Type based on "Shifu"'s Combat Type) equal to 12% of March 7th's ATK.

Harmony, Nihility, Preservation, Abundance: Increases the Toughness Reduction of this instance of DMG by 100%.

skill_stages.desc:
Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 163% of March 7th's ATK to a single target enemy.
Increases the initial Hits Per Action of the next Enhanced Basic ATK by 2 hits and increase the fixed chance of additionally dealing DMG by 20%.

skill_stages.desc:
After Shifu uses an attack or Ultimate, March 7th gains up to 1 point of Charge each time.
Upon reaching 7 or more points of Charge, March 7th immediately takes action and increases the DMG she deals by 48%. Her Basic ATK gets Enhanced, and her Skill cannot be used. After using Enhanced Basic ATK, consumes 7 point(s) of Charge. Charge is capped at 10 points.

skill_stages.desc:
If March 7th is on the team, she gains 1 point of Charge at the start of the next battle whenever a teammate uses Technique, up to a max of 3 point(s).
After using Technique, March 7th regenerates 30 Energy when the next battle starts.

skill_stages.desc: After using Enhanced Basic ATK, increases Shifu's CRIT DMG by 60% and Break Effect by 36%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

equip.desc: In the beginning, it had the exact same pose as the previous portrait. Looking at the face identical to hers, she was convinced that this was not her. "Impossible. How can two portraits be exactly the same?" She tweaked its joints, opened its eyes, and made its fingers softer. She looked happy when all the changes were done. "Completely different from yesterday. This is more like who I am today."
equip.name: The Birth of the Self

ornaments.desc: Encapsulated in the plane is one of Salsotto's last remaining moving cities — Tumbleweed. This city never stopped and barely escaped from a fate of being swallowed up either by the dark night or the midnight sun.
ornaments.name: Salsotto's Moving City

ornaments.desc: Planet Salsotto's own rotation stopped, and thus each cycle of its day and night seemed to last forever. People can only gain the bare minimum space for survival when they ceaselessly migrated and closely chased the ever-moving terminator line.
ornaments.name: Salsotto's Terminator Line
